== Services ==

You can directly participate in the support and development of 
**Typus**, including new features, by hiring our team to work on your 
project. We offer customization services for modules and extensions 
for a fee.

A few examples of customizations:

- CMS: Page, blocks and configuration.
- Assets manager.
- Ebook publishing and delivering platform.
- Newsletter, blog and e-commerce modules.

Send your inquiries to hello@intraducibles.com.
